title: The Cave: a parable told by Orson Welles
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, C B Wismar, Nick Bosustow and Counterpoint Films
brief_description: An animated dramatization based on “The Allegory of the Cave” from Book 7 of Plato’s “Republic” illustrating mankind’s escape from the world of illusion to the world of reality. Four men chained in a cave take images reflected on a wall for the truth. Narrated by Orson Welles.
